pages.text: The $(mob)Dryad$() is a neutral monster that spawns in Forest biomes during the day and above ground in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It is vulnerable to axes and Fire. A $(mob)Dryad$() will not attack players unless provoked, after which it will retaliate with weak melee attacks. Attacking a $(mob)Dryad$() angers all others in the area, similar to the $(mob)Zombie Pigman$(). When the $(mob)Dryad$() reaches 25%, it will flee to recover health. While in water, it recovers 10% of its health every 10 seconds and gains $(thing)Resistance$().
$(mob)Dryads$() drop $(item)Tap Root$() on death. These are an insignificant source of food, but remove negative status effects when consumed.

$(mob)Dryads$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death. Right-click to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Or, instead smelt in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
